note.p: Letter is a printed circular sent to the heads of 13 departments.

div.p: I have the honor to request that you will furnish me, for the information of the Honorable the Treasurer, with a statement of existing contracts in connection with your department, showing as under: —
The original amount of the contract.
The amount paid during the current financial year.
The further amount likely to be required to the end of the year.
The appropriation to which such further amount is chargeable.

p.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in;
p.seg: It is desired the statement may include all
contracts, when the works, service, or articles contracted for, are for an ascertained amount.
